section.title: Textbook
section.p: We are using a free textbook written by Greg Hartman of the Virginia Military Institute mathematics department. The book is called APEX Calculus.

Access this book:
as a free HTML book at opentext.uleth.ca/apex-video/apex-calculus.html.
in various PDF forms at www.apexcalculus.com/.
for purchase from the PCC book store for $16.00. (PCC will ship it to you for free during the pandemic closure.)

Please note that there are some differences in the content between the HTML version of the book and the PDFs or printed copies. These differences are not important, but you may notice them if you use both versions to study.
